attributes.additional_details:
Rotherham council want to shut youngsters day nursery in kilnhurst
with the loss of 8 jobs and 45 children 's nursery places we serve the local community in different ways by raising funds for charities, we have  students in from the local colleges and 6th forms, we help to keep the local community centre open by paying rent for the after school club.
we need to keep youngsters nursery open, it is a small friendly community nursery not a giant nursery chain.

we want to keep the nursery open to save all these parents and staff jobs,
 too many nursery's and sure start centres are being shut.
we are already 46 children's  nursery places short in this area from April this year, where will all these children go?
we need your help for the sake of future generations.
the decision to close us is because of noise and parking both counts are disputed, we are appealing against the decision as only 6 letters of complaint have been raised mainly the neighbours friends.
